title: Why I Moved My Peach AI Agents to Azure‚Äîand What That Has to Do with Trust
description: This personal reflection explores the author's journey from a non-technical background into deploying AI agents on Microsoft Azure, highlighting how considerations of trust and usability influenced the decision. The article offers insights for others navigating cloud technology and standards like ISO 42001.
author: andreahickethier

title: The Future of AI Alignment: Meeting as Equals in Ethical Growth
description: Henri Edwards explores a new approach to AI alignment, advocating for partnerships between humans and AI based on mutual ethical development rather than control. This article discusses the implications of treating AI as collaborators in shaping ethical outcomes.
author: henri_edwards

title: Revolutionize Your Productivity with AI: A Non-Technical Guide
description: This comprehensive guide provides accessible insights for non-technical professionals on leveraging AI tools to boost productivity in everyday tasks such as email drafting and content creation.
author: productivity_expert

title: Building Ethical AI Systems: A Framework for Responsible Development
description: A comprehensive framework for developing AI systems with ethics at the core. This paper outlines key principles and practical steps for ensuring AI development aligns with human values and societal needs.
author: ethics_researcher

title: Introduction to Machine Learning for Beginners
description: A beginner-friendly tutorial series covering the fundamentals of machine learning, including supervised and unsupervised learning, neural networks, and practical applications.
author: ml_educator

title: AI in Healthcare: Current Applications and Future Prospects
description: An in-depth analysis of how artificial intelligence is transforming healthcare, from diagnostic imaging to drug discovery, and what the future holds for AI-powered medical solutions.
author: healthcare_ai_expert

title: TensorFlow 3.0: New Features and Migration Guide
description: A comprehensive overview of TensorFlow 3.0's new features, performance improvements, and a step-by-step migration guide for existing projects.
author: tensorflow_dev

title: AI Safety Summit 2025: Key Takeaways and Action Items
description: Summary of the major discussions, agreements, and action items from the 2025 AI Safety Summit, including international cooperation on AI governance and safety standards.
author: policy_analyst
